doc.title: Boys with Toys
doc.plot: "They're not dolls - they're ACTION FIGURES"! boys with toys examines the world of "Action Figure" enthusiasts, men who play with dolls. Why are people so attached to an inanimate toy? This documentary is about a group of men who have rediscovered a connection with their past, a league who have refused to put away their childish things. The film explores what Action Figures mean to them and how they have affected their lives.
